feed.title: ICS-CSIRT.io
feed.subtitle: ICS-CSIRT is a community effort to dissimenate security information on Industrial Control Systems. Membership of ics-csirt.io is free and grants you access to a MISP and OpenCVE instance.

entry.title: 2020 ICS Cybersecurity Year in Review
entry.content:
Dragos published its annual analysis of Industrial Control System (ICS)/Operational Technology (OT) focused cyber threats, vulnerabilities, assessments, and incident response insights.

2020 ICS Cybersecurity Year in Review
entry.summary: Dragos published its annual analysis of Industrial Control System (ICS)/Operational Technology (OT) focused cyber threats, vulnerabilities, assessments, and incident response insights.
